#include<bits/stdc++.h>
using namespace std;
#define ll long long
#define s(n) scanf("%lld",&n);
ll a[100001]={0};
int main()
{
    ll t,i,l,r;
    s(t);
    while(t--) {
        ll n,q,ans;
        s(n);
        s(q);
        s(a[1]);
        for(i=2;i<=n;i++) {
            s(a[i]);
            a[i] = a[i] + a[i-1];
        }
 
        
 
 
        while(q--) {
            s(l);
            s(r);
            ans = a[r] - a[l-1];
            printf("%lld\n", ans);
        }
 
 
    }
 
    return 0;
}
